AdminQuestions.mediaErrorFileSize: The combined file size has exceeded the limit of 1.5MB!
AdminQuestions.mediaWarningFileSize: The combined file size is about to about to exceed the limit of 1.5MB! Please consider uploading less files or smaller files.
AdminQuestions.mediaErrorFileType: file(s) type uploaded was found not to be supported! Please only upload images.
AdminQuestions.binaryTreeNoElementsError: You need to input the elements that are going to be in the tree
AdminQuestions.binaryTreeWrongFormatError:
Wrong format for the element list!
 Only number values and the elements should be separated by a ,
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLAddMissingFieldsError: Missing required fields for an add tree question!
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLAddDuplicateElementError: Cannot add a node to the existing tree that has the same value as an existing node!
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLAddInvalidResultBinarySearchTreeEr: The resulting tree is not a valid Binary Search Tree
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLAddInvalidResultAVLTreeError: The resulting tree is not a valid AVL Tree
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLRemoveMissingFieldsError: Missing required fields for an remove tree question!
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLRemoveMissingElementError: An element that is to be removed from the given tree does not exist in the given tree!
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLRemoveInvalidResultBinarySearchTre: One of the resulting trees are not a valid Binary Search Tree
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLRemoveInvalidResultAVLTreeError: One of the resulting trees are not a valid AVL Tree
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLRootCountError: The given tree has more than 1 root node!
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLInvalidBinaryTreeError: The given tree is not a valid Binary Tree!
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLInvalidBinarySearchTreeError: The given tree is not a valid Binary Search Tree!
AdminQuestions.treeElementTypeError: The element list should only contain numbered-valued elements!
AdminQuestions.BSTAVLInvalidTreeActionError: Neither add tree question or remove tree question was chosen!

LoginForm.acceptCheckbox: I accept these terms and conditions
feideList: This website will use cookies to be able to store your questions.
The quizmaster will not be able to see who answered what, but will be able to see incorrect answers.
This website will store date linked to your user for you to be able to see previous sessions.
You will be able to delete all data stored about you by going in to profile and pressing "Delete data".
To be able to sign in with Feide, you will have to accept that we use cookies and store information about you below!
anonymousList: If you chose to sign in anonymously we will not store cookies or save any data about you.
If you chose to sign in anonymously you will not be able to see previously attended sessions.

textList: The page you have requested can't be authorized for you.
Please go back and log in before trying to enter this page.

404.text: Uh oh! Look like something broke.

deleteInfoList: By pressing ok under we will delete all the information we have on the server and database about you.
By pressing ok under you will be logged out and redirected to the home page.
Once deleted there is no going back!
DeleteUserInfo.title: Delete all user data!

ClientSessionQuestion.question: Question
ClientSessionQuestion.leaveSessionBody:
By clicking ok you will leave this session.
All answers up to this point will be saved.

ClientSessionWaitingArea.title: Waiting Area
ClientSessionWaitingArea.beforeSession:
Joined session!
Waiting for admin to start the session
ClientSessionWaitingArea.betweenQuestionsCorrect:
You have answered and your answer was correct!
Waiting for admin to start the next question
ClientSessionWaitingArea.betweenQuestionsIncorrect:
You have answered and your answer was incorrect!
You can check your answer towards the solution after the session is over.
Waiting for admin to start the next question
ClientSessionWaitingArea.betweenQuestionsNotAnswered:
You answered "I don't know"!
You can check the solution after the session is over.
Waiting for admin to start the next question
ClientSessionWaitingArea.sessionFinished:
The session is over!
All your answers are stored and you can view them with the solution back at the dashboard if you haven't logged in as anonomously.
ClientSessionWaitingArea.waitingForAdmin: Waiting for admin to start the next question
